name: Eleven More
description:
Challenge your mind, fighting against the clock to get eliminate all tokens from the table in this solitaire game. Select the tokens until you get to add up to 11 points and then they disappear. Could you get it?

Four game modes:
• PRACTICE: No time limit and hints to get the point of the game.
• CLASSIC: The classic eleven solitaire, with 2 lives, and round of 2 minutes.
• ARCADE: Using power-ups (to get hints, bomb the tokens, or get more time) and try to beat the increasing difficulty.
• TIME ATTACK: Only one round, getting more time for each token you reach to eliminate. Only for PROS!

Game fully customizable: You can change the tokens shape, the colors palette and even the value to reach!

Compete with other players around the world to reach the top stop on the leaderboard!

If you enjoyed our game TAKE ELEVEN, then you gonna love this version!

Addiction guaranteed for all the family!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
